```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

### Read The Text

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#63d6c6"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "#63d6c6"))

pdf_link1 <- function() {
 paste0("<a href='/handouts/Bailey%20(1988).pdf' target='_blank'>", "<img src='/logos/pdf-ico.png' alt='Slack icon' width='40'>", "</a>")
}

pdf_link2 <- function() {
 paste0("<a href='/handouts/Kosinski,%20Matz,%20Gosling,%20Popov,%20&%20Stillwell%20(2015).pdf' target='_blank'>", "<img src='/logos/pdf-ico.png' alt='Slack icon' width='40'>", "</a>")
}

read_schedule <- read_csv("readings.csv",
                          show_col_types = FALSE) %>% 
                  as_tibble() %>%
                  mutate(Required = case_when(
                  Required == "checked" ~ as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px")),
                Required == "unchecked" ~ as.character(fontawesome::fa("times-circle", fill = "#d9534f", height = "15px"))
              )) %>%
                  mutate(across(everything(), as.character)) %>%
                    filter(Week == 3) %>% #CHANGE HERE
                    select(-Week) %>%
                  filter_all(any_vars(!is.na(.))) %>% 
                  mutate(
                    across(everything(), ~replace_na(.x, ""))
                  ) %>%
                select_if(~!all(is.na(.))) 
  
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(read_schedule, 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'lllccccccccc') %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = F) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "25em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "5em") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(5, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(6, width = "5em") %>%
  column_spec(1:6, color = "#ffffff") %>%
  row_spec(0:1, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#ffffff", background = "transparent")
```

### Read Some Papers

```{r echo=FALSE}

readings <- tibble(
  
  paper <- c("Bailey, K.D. (1988). Ethical Dilemmas in Social Problems Research: A Theoretical Framework. <i>The American Sociologist 19</i>(2). 121-137. <a href='https://doi.org/10.1007/BF02691806' target='_blank'>https://doi.org/10.1007/BF02691806 </a>", 
             "Kosinski, M., Matz, S.C., Gosling, S.D., Popov, V. & Stillwell, D. (2015). Facebook as a Research Tool for the Social Sciences <i>American Psychologist 70</i>(6). 543-566. <a href='https://doi.org/10.1037/a0039210' target='_blank'>https://doi.org/10.1037/a0039210</a>"
  ),
  
  download <- c(
    pdf_link1(),
    pdf_link2()
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```
